description: Defines the client-side visual and audio properties of a biome. Client biomes control fog, water color, grass tint, ambient sounds, and music within a biome. They are paired with server-side biome definitions that control gameplay behavior.

tokens.text: defines client-side biome visuals, sounds, and atmosphere

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Definition
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Contains a description and components to define a Client Biome.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Non-component settings, including the Client Biome name.
